questions.question: にほんご（＿）べんきょうします。
questions.hint:
Grammar Help:

～をべんきょうします - to study (something)

にほんご - Japanese language

explanation.correct:
Correct! 🎉

「にほんごをべんきょうします」 means "I study Japanese."
explanation.incorrect:
Incorrect Answer

The correct answer is を.

  • が - marks subject, not correct here
  • で - place marker
  • に - direction/time marker

questions.question: 日曜日（＿）山へ行きます。
questions.hint:
Grammar Help:

～に行きます - go to (place) or on (day)

日曜日 - Sunday

explanation.correct:
Correct! 🎉

「日曜日に山へ行きます」 means "I will go to the mountains on Sunday."
explanation.incorrect:
Incorrect Answer

The correct answer is に.

  • を - object marker
  • が - subject marker
  • で - place of action, not time

questions.question: このカレー（＿）とてもからいです。
questions.hint:
Grammar Help:

～は～です - describing something as a topic

からい - spicy

explanation.correct:
Correct! 🎉

「このカレーはとてもからいです」 means "This curry is very spicy."
explanation.incorrect:
Incorrect Answer

The correct answer is は.

  • と - with
  • を - object marker, not used here
  • に - not suitable for this sentence
